title: Real-time analysis and prediction method of ion concentration using the effect of O–H stretching bands in aqueous solutions based on ATR-FTIR spectroscopy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20073-20080
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01473A, Paper

So Hyun Baek, Jeungjai Yun, Seung-Hwan Lee, Hyun-Woo Lee, Yongbum Kwon, Kee-Ryung Park, Yoseb Song, Bum Sung Kim, Rhokyun Kwak, Haejin Hwang, Da-Woon Jeong
ATR-FTIR can be utilized to instantly and economically analyze changes in the concentration of a desired ion in solution. This method can be utilized as an indicator for automated control of ion concentration systems.
